name: Gacha Cat
description:
Gacha Cat is a two player trading card game featuring Cats!

Players go through a 'Gacha' Roll where Cats will choose their owner. From there, players will battle each other with their Cats and the first player to defeat each other's Cats wins the game!

To get started, download the rules located below.

Playing Field: https://playingcards.io/qgm8m7

Gacha Roll: https://playingcards.io/j9ne6n
